page.title: 10Shipham's Sunday School.
page.content: The S.S. started in February 1984. Mrs. Mitchell and some ladies got together and organised it with the Vicar's help.They organise every Sunday morning except when we have a Family Service. There are 6 teachers and a lady who helps. We have about 26 regular members and some older children who come on special occasions. Each week we go down to Church at half past nine. We sing some children's hymns and have a prayer. Next we go into our age grups and we learn about Jesus. We use leaflets called Adventures and we all like them. When we hear the little ones singing their choruses we gather back together again and one of the children says a prayer. We sing some more hymns and then it is time to go home.
